Guard Zenath:
Sakum created Kanilov. In a way, they're actually twins - it seems the life energy absorbed by Kanilov is being transmitted to Sakum, making him virtuually indestructible as long as Kanilov lives...
We need to stop Sakum, obviously, but first we must kill Kanilov. Are you up to the task?
